name: places/ChIJ9XkMovBYwokRRuMiMP7-IuM
formattedAddress: 42 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 42 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019-2505, USA

editorialSummary.text: Extended-stay hotel offering studios & suites with full kitchens, plus espresso & cocktail bars.

originalText.text: The location is amazing.. but the hotel has no daily house keeping service. The rooms are clean but especially the bathroom was so tiny that we had difficulty placing our toothbrush! Not worthed for the money!

text.text: The location is amazing.. but the hotel has no daily house keeping service. The rooms are clean but especially the bathroom was so tiny that we had difficulty placing our toothbrush! Not worthed for the money!

originalText.text: This is a great hotel at a great price in an amazing location. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the room was really comfortable. Central Park is one block from the front door. Highly recommend this hotel.

text.text: This is a great hotel at a great price in an amazing location. The staff are friendly and helpful, and the room was really comfortable. Central Park is one block from the front door. Highly recommend this hotel.

originalText.text:
I stayed here years ago, and it was exceptional. Now except for location, this has been a shockingly terrible experience at most levels.

Let’s start with the basics of service - from the director of rooms to the late night staff, the idea of service doesn’t exist. They are quick to DEMAND payment, then forget to render a service which was charged for, and follow up attitude and apathy.

We are staying for 21 days. They demanded payment upfront and in full. Now they have 100% of my money and can do as they please and treat people as they want.

Let’s start with a small incident of drinking water in the rooms. For 8 days, the process was to call the front desk and someone would bring water up to the rooms. On Day 9, the rules changed. Now there’s a charge. And the charge is unapologetically steep.

Want trash removed from your room? It’s $75! It’s construed as “Service” and the director of rooms who likes to repeat the word doesn’t even know what she is charging $75 for. If you question the front desk for why the room hasn’t been cleaned despite paying the service charge - you get a hollow apology and then lies from the robots about how it was a system error etc.

The General Manager - sweet man etc, clearly is out of his depth running the hotel with a bunch of arrogant novices.

There are 3 outstanding members of their team however. All in the day shift - a chirpy man at the door who wants to go on a diet, and two lovely guys at the front desk. You know who you are.

The Cafe shut down mid-stay. No warning whatsoever. So, the hotel has no F&B. There are numerous restaurants around, and I would recommend stepping out anyways. There is no hob. Utensils aren’t cleaned daily or replenished. This is not a serviced apartment. It’s a hotel room with a microwave oven. So don’t be fooled by the idea of a large spacious serviced apartment. It’s a decent sized hotel room and that’s it.

It’s just a basic lack of empathy for the guest, and an over eager demand for payment upfront. What I don’t get is their attitude - the staff should be here BECAUSE of the guest and FOR the guest. So sitting on their chairs, responding as if we were intruding on their otherwise busy lives and speaking in a brusque tone is just not what hospitality is about.

The hotel needs to rebrand as a place to stay and NOTHING else. Bring your own everything except a basic bed and a basic shower. Nothing else works. Everything else is charged for. Easyhotel is much the same but at least they don’t pretend to be anything other than functional. After all the extra charges that will be added to provide basic service, I was probably better off staying at a full service hotel in the neighbourhood.

The sad thing is that I have another 10 days in this dump, as they have my money!

originalText.text: Maid service only once a week for the price they ask for is crazy. The hotel just seems disappointing compared to their other locations. I would definitely recommend going to their other locations for much better service.

text.text: Maid service only once a week for the price they ask for is crazy. The hotel just seems disappointing compared to their other locations. I would definitely recommend going to their other locations for much better service.

originalText.text: The hotel it’s amazing, we stayed at the ph and incredible view and the space it’s comfortable and the kitchen has everything you need. The hotel personal are very friendly. It was everything really nice I don’t put 5 starts, because we hired the hotel transport service and it was terrible experience we pay in advance with our travel agency and the got a misunderstanding between them. We were screemed and bad treated the all way to the airport without reason. It was super uncofortable thats not the way to treat clients. So i higly recommend the hotel BUT do not take transport service with them.
